name: Hero to Zero
description:
Hero to Zero

Play as a murderous villain to defeat the good guy, but to get to him you must go through a bunch of cops first. With incredible speed, jaw dropping energy explosions, and fast paced action sequences. The fun never ends with Hero to Zero.

Support us on Patreon and get exclusive content before anyone else!
